name: Toggle Quest
description: In Toggle Quest, players explore a fantasy world and complete quests using unique toggle switch mechanics. The bottom panel of the game screen features toggle switches that can be activated to trigger various actions in the top panel, such as parallax scrolling backgrounds, enemy battles, and item drops. With a retro aesthetic and sprite-based characters, players will use their inventory and toggle switch abilities to progress through quests and unlock new areas of the world. Join the adventure on itch.io today!
